title: Hot Boy Turk in the trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English
itunes:title: Hot Boy Turk in the trap! with Karlous Miller and Clayton English
description:
Hot Boy Turk got so many stories bout being a part of the Cash Money Millionaire movement and he shares them with Karlous Miller and Clayton English in the trap! Turk tells the story of how BG, Lil Wayne, Juvenile and Soulja (Magnolia) Slim created the soundtrack to a whole generation.



Plus,Turk tells the story of Diddy stunting on Birdman way way back in the day and how Birdman subsequently became the #1 Stunna! Mannie Fresh,

Slim and Baby and many more New Orleans legends paved the way for Turk and he tells the story of his rise, fall and he resurgence in the media after doing time.


Turk has even more stories to tell in his book! Buy it now!

https://www.thriftbooks.com/w/the-ori...




Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...



FOLLOW THE CREW

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
